name: Dale Broks
description: I was raised with a strike Christian background and taught from a young age to always respect myself and other people. I still maintains this value wherever I goes. The inner beauty is more important for me than the beauty of appearance. I am a passionate man and l love to be affectionate. In the long run it is companionship and enjoyment of what each person loves to do. The compatibility to enjoy it together. I am not into lust, rather into finding chemistry that will lead to love and monogamy.
